answers.answer: If u failed. ..im not sure never had that problem
Anybody who failed 1 hr & passed 3 hr?

I'm not trying to scare you, it's just some women can't handle all the sugar they give you at once during the 3 hour test. I had mine two weeks ago and about 45 minutes after I started feeling sick and I almost passed out. I would get hot flashes as well. But everyone is different so it might not bother you. I would suggest not going alone in case you do start to feel sick, that way whoever is with you can let a nurse a know.
I failed my 1 hour test and also had to take a 3 hour test and passed with flying colors. My nurse said that 90% of women fail the 1 hour so no reason to worry
What is thAt? What do u do.. I have a 4 year old and don't recall doing this I'm 14 weeks preg now. When do u do this test?

Its the same as the 1 hr test but they draw your blood once an hour for 3 hours. Its ok just bring a book or something so you don't get bored.Plus if you failed the 1 hr that doesn't mean you will fail the 3 hr.There's still a chance you dont have it.:)And if you do have it they just put you on a diet you'll be just fine:)
I went to the dr today turns out i have two skin conditions:/
Gestational diabetes aka glucola test. I believe u take it at 28 weeks? Idk my memory is crappie. Im 38 weeks now

@Munchkinn94 same happened with me. It made me feel so sick and I was so faint and almost just passed out. I had to lay down in there. But I passed it, they just told me that mine was a lil low I guess.
failed 1hour test passed 3hour ;)
Does everyone take it? . I'm pretty sure I didn't take it.. on the other hand my Dr was stupid.  I dont have the same Dr this time so maybe I'll have to do it this time
Everyone has to take the test and if ur doctor does not require it then I recommend that u ask for it as it is vital for babys health

There's no reason to be terrified. I failed both tests and have the gestational diabetes. The 3 hour test they will draw your blood 4 times, once before the drink then once every hour. It's just boring that's all. And if you fail it you just have to test your sugar and change your diet a bit. It's really not a big deal. Just means your placenta is super rich.
Sorry so late.. but I just pray that I pass. If not,I'm gonna be worried as hell and on a strict diet
@dmaxine88 thanks! That made me feel much better either way lol
@YasmineSimone - I sent you message. Your name sounds so familiar and you're also from S.C. I swear I know you, lol. Not trying to be a creeper!
I failed my 1 hr test w my son passed 3 hr .. i also failed 1 hr this pregnancy and failed 3 hr .. i think the glucola is jus alot of sugar for ur body to handle on the 1 hr
Lol, ok @Munchkinn94 I'm gonna check it. & yes hab, me too because I felt a little nauseas after the 1 hr

I also failed the 3 hour test but all u have to do is to change your diet and take less sugar. Your dr might sent u to a nutritionist for advice. But i can assure u that the 3 hour test is not horrible. Just make sure u go there fasting.They will take your blood 3 times.(One per hour). One before u take the drink and the other 2 afterwards. Try to make friends with other ladies there so that u can kill time.
I failed my one hour and I have to go Friday for my 3 hour. Although with my one hour about 3 hours after drinking the glucola my sugar dropped to 42.

question: Ok.. I failed my one hour diabetes test. The office was supposed to call and let me know but they didnt -_- the score was supposed to be 39 or lower and I scored a 47. I have to do the 3 hour in 2 days and I'm terrified.. talk to me. How was your experience?
title: Failed, talk to me please :(
